assessments.issue: Magic number 20 for admin role could be more readable
assessments.action: Keeping role=20 to maintain consistency with existing codebase patterns. The same magic number is used throughout the API views (module.py:497, issue.py:778, cycle.py:568, etc.). Introducing a constant only in this file would create inconsistency. While constants exist in the codebase (e.g., plane/db/models/project.py), the API views consistently use the literal value.

assessments.issue: Discussion request: Add update() and destroy() methods
assessments.action: PATCH and DELETE endpoints were already implemented in PageDetailAPIEndpoint (patch at line 145, delete at line 191). Updated IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md to document these endpoints.

assessments.issue: Discussion request: Small change to .md file for PR
assessments.action: Updated IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md with documentation for PATCH and DELETE endpoints.

summary: Addressed all feedback items. The magic number issue is a WONT_DO because it follows established codebase patterns - using a constant only here would introduce inconsistency. The PATCH and DELETE endpoints were already implemented; updated documentation to reflect this. IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md now documents all four endpoints: POST, GET (list and detail), PATCH, and DELETE.
